content: I understand that I need to focus on engagement metrics, reach and impressions metrics, follower growth metrics, conversion metrics, and other metrics to measure the success of my social media campaign. I'll definitely start tracking these metrics using Instagram Insights and third-party tools. By the way, I've been spending around an hour each day engaging with followers by responding to comments and direct messages. Do you think this is a good use of my time, or should I allocate my time differently?
